about_the_game:
[h3]Introducing: Camped Out![/h3]
Camped Out is a frenetic couch co-op game for friends and families, where up to four players work together to set up camp before darkness falls. Each level is a race against the clock where players are required to build tents, construct a campfire, cook enough food and get into bed before the night arrives.

If you're a fan of Overcooked and co-operative gaming, you'll feel right at home with Camped Out!



[h3]The Demo[/h3]
The pre-release demo throws you right into the action, with a quick tutorial to teach you ropes before opening up the first two areas of the game world, which includes 4 more campsites to complete. The game can be played with up to four players, either local co-op or using Steam's Remote Play Together, and comes with full controller support.



We hope you enjoy your journey.
detailed_description:
[h3]Introducing: Camped Out![/h3]
Camped Out is a frenetic couch co-op game for friends and families, where up to four players work together to set up camp before darkness falls. Each level is a race against the clock where players are required to build tents, construct a campfire, cook enough food and get into bed before the night arrives.

If you're a fan of Overcooked and co-operative gaming, you'll feel right at home with Camped Out!



[h3]The Demo[/h3]
The pre-release demo throws you right into the action, with a quick tutorial to teach you ropes before opening up the first two areas of the game world, which includes 4 more campsites to complete. The game can be played with up to four players, either local co-op or using Steam's Remote Play Together, and comes with full controller support.



We hope you enjoy your journey.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Camped Out! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Camped Out is a frenetic couch co-op game for friends and families where up to four players work together to set up camp before darkness falls.
